Ru_trainchinese: yé: (сущ) дед, дедушка (со стороны отца); уважительная форма обращения к пожилому мужчине; устаревшая форма обращения к богатому человеку; хозяин, господин; бог
Kanshudo_mnemonic: questionning (耶) your father (父) is the old man
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Your grandfather is the one who taught your father how to chop vegetables.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " father ", " ye " sound, the original meaning is father. Ancient Yuefu "Mulan Poetry": "The twelve books of the army have the name of the master."

" Ye " can mean a respectful name for a male elder. "Old Tang Book-Eunuch's Biography-Gao Lishi": "Suzong is in the erotic palace and he is called the second brother; the kings and princesses call A Weng; the horsemen are called the Lord."

" Ye " can also be a respectful name for the gods. Hong Xiuquan of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom: "The Tianli first emphasizes filial piety and worships Fu Lujia on the 7th." The titles such as "Lord of the Land" and "Lord Stove" still preserved in the folk culture today also come from this meaning.

" Ye " can also mean grandfather. Shen Bang's "Miscellaneous Notes of Wan Shu-Folk Customs II" of the Ming Dynasty: "The ancestors are the grandfathers." Today, I call my grandfather "grandfather" and the grandfathers are called "grandfather".
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " father ", " ye ", the original meaning is father.
humanum_full_description:
從「父」，「耶」聲，本義為父親。古樂府〈木蘭詩〉：「軍書十二卷，卷卷有爺名。」

　　「爺」可表示對男性尊長的敬稱。《舊唐書‧宦官傳‧高力士》：「肅宗在春宮，呼為二兄；諸王、公主皆呼阿翁；駙馬輩呼為爺。」

　　「爺」也可表示對神靈的尊稱。太平天國洪秀全〈改定天曆詔〉：「天曆首重孝順爺，七日禮拜福祿加。」今民俗文化中仍保存的「土地爺」、「灶王爺」等稱呼，亦來自此義。

　　「爺」還可表示祖父。明沈榜《宛署雜記‧民風二》：「祖曰爺。」今稱呼祖父「爺爺」，及稱祖父輩人士為「大爺」，即來自此義。

①父親：“軍書十二卷，卷卷有爺名”。
②祖父：爺爺。姥爺。
③對長輩或年長男子的敬稱：張大爺。
④舊時對官僚、財主等的稱呼：縣太爺。少(shào)爺。
⑤對佛、神的稱呼：佛爺。財神爺。
(Simplified: 爷)

Kanshudo mnemonic:questionning (耶) your father (父) is the old man
Chinese: Father!!! My Father exclaimed when he saw my grandfather again in Jerusalem.  
Meaning: grandfather
Hanzi: 爷
Story: Your grandfather is the one who taught your father how to chop vegetables.
Kind: traditional
從「 父 」，「 耶 」聲，本義為父親。古樂府〈木蘭詩〉：「軍書十二卷，卷卷有爺名。」 「 爺 」可表示對男性尊長的敬稱。《舊唐書‧宦官傳‧高力士》：「肅宗在春宮，呼為二兄；諸王、公主皆呼阿翁；駙馬輩呼為爺。」 「 爺 」也可表示對神靈的尊稱。太平天國洪秀全〈改定天曆詔〉：「天曆首重孝順爺，七日禮拜福祿加。」今民俗文化中仍保存的「土地爺」、「灶王爺」等稱呼，亦來自此義。 「 爺 」還可表示祖父。明沈榜《宛署雜記‧民風二》：「祖曰爺。」今稱呼祖父「爺爺」，及稱祖父輩人士為「大爺」，即來自此義。
From the " father", " ye" sound, the original meaning is father. Ancient Yuefu "Mulan Poetry": "The twelve books of the army have the name of the master." " Ye" can mean a respectful name for a male elder. "Old Tang Book-Eunuch's Biography-Gao Lishi": "Suzong is in the erotic palace and he is called the second brother; the kings and princesses call A Weng; the horsemen are called the Lord." " Ye" can also be a respectful name for the gods. Hong Xiuquan of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom: "The Tianli first emphasizes filial piety and worships Fu Lujia on the 7th." The titles such as "Lord of the Land" and "Lord Stove" still preserved in the folk culture today also come from this meaning. " Ye" can also mean grandfather. Shen Bang's "Miscellaneous Notes of Wan Shu-Folk Customs II" of the Ming Dynasty: "The ancestors are the grandfathers." Today, I call my grandfather "grandfather" and the grandfathers are called "grandfather".

爺字的基本解释

爺
yé
见“爷”。

爺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yé］
［《玉篇》以遮切］
“爷1”的繁体字。
(1)父亲。
(2)旧时对男性尊长的敬称。
(3)对神灵的尊称。
(4)自矜之称。
(5)方言。祖父。

爺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【父字部】　爺； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页690第11
〔古文〕?【玉篇】以遮切，音耶。俗呼爲父爺字。【古木蘭詩】軍書三十卷，卷卷有爺名。

爺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
爺字的起名意思

暂无。

Traditional characters for "爷1".
(1) Father.
(2) The old honorific name for male elders.
(3) The honorific title for the gods.
(4) Known as self-contained.
(5) Dialects. grandfather.

[Si Collection] [Father's Word Department] 　 Ye; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 690 No. 11
[Ancient text]? [Jade articles] To cover cutting, sound. Commonly called the word for father and father. [Ancient Mulan Poems] Thirty volumes of military books, the volume has the name of the master.
